revised_title: Investigation of Fourth-Power Vibrations in Molecular Systems
tldr: The author investigates a type of molecular vibration called a 'fourth-power vibration' where the potential energy is proportional to the fourth power of the displacement. They explore the properties of these vibrations in plane rings and molecules containing a plane ring of four or more atoms. The author derives the energy levels and wave functions of a one-dimensional oscillator with V(x) = ax^4 and discusses the thermodynamic implications of these vibrations.
